CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 8, 1947, pg. 36, reads: "Zoom to the Moon - Students of Herron Hill Junior High School who assisted in the assembling and mounting of the interesting poster used this year to spark the annual Beacon Sales campaign, look at the astonished moon on the chart. In the thoroughly uncomfortable position of having twenty-five determined rockets aimed in his direction, the man in this moon just hangs there and looks as sales climb for the school paper and each rocket gets closer to its goal. Looking on are Ralph Harper, Ruth Wilson, Olivia Woolridge, Joseph Roberts, Lina Martin and George Nixon. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Herron Hill Junior High School students, including Ralph Harper, Ruth Wilson, Olivia Woolridge, Joseph Roberts, Lina Martin, and George Nixon gathered around large poster depicting rocket ships going to the moon for fundraising campaign, in classroom
